content.question: Discuss TWO possible methods of eradicating or slowing the spread of these ants, including the environmental consequences of each method.

frqParts.text: Discuss TWO possible methods of eradicating or slowing the spread of these ants, including the environmental consequences of each method.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
